heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_ursa
heroes.bio_loc: Ulfsaar the Warrior is the fiercest member of an ursine tribe, protective of his land and his people. During the long winters, while the mothers sleep and nurse their cubs, the males patrol the lands above as tireless, vigilant defenders of their ancient ways. Hearing dim but growing rumors of a spreading evil, Ulfsaar headed out beyond the boundaries of his wild wooded homeland, intending to track down and destroy the threat at its source, before it could endanger his people. He is a proud creature with a bright strong spirit, utterly trustworthy, a staunch ally and defender.
heroes.hype_loc: With each swipe of his claws, Ursa increases his target's vulnerability to his next attack. Capable of briefly increasing how swiftly he can strike, and able to slow down nearby prey, he quickly tears apart his enemies.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Deals more damage with every hit to the same foe

facets.description_loc: Debuffs inflicted by Ursa last %debuff_amp%%% longer.
facets.name: ursa_debuff_reduce

abilities.name: ursa_earthshock
abilities.desc_loc: Ursa leaps forward %hop_distance% units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for %abilityduration% seconds.
abilities.lore_loc: The very steps of a male ursine shake the ground as well as the resolve of opposing warriors.
abilities.shard_loc: Earthshock applies a %shard_enrage_duration% second Enrage on Ursa when cast.

abilities.name: ursa_overpower
abilities.desc_loc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed and slow resistance for a number of subsequent attacks.
abilities.lore_loc: For a behemoth of his size, Ursa is deceptively nimble.
notes_loc: Overpower isn't removed by Black King Bar.
Missing an attack still consumes a charge of Overpower.

abilities.name: ursa_fury_swipes
abilities.desc_loc: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after %bonus_reset_time% seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
abilities.lore_loc: In nature, the wounded rarely survive the attacks of hungry predators.

abilities.name: ursa_maul
abilities.desc_loc: Ursa gains bonus damage equal to a percentage of his Current HP.

abilities.name: ursa_enrage
abilities.desc_loc:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: Ulfsaar succumbs to his ancient spirit, becoming the most ferocious creature on the battlefield.
abilities.scepter_loc: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.
facets_loc: When damaged during Enrage, Ursa gains bonus attack damage.

abilities.name: ursa_bear_down
abilities.desc_loc: Debuffs inflicted by Ursa last %debuff_amp%%% longer.
